Actions.Name: Line Breaker
Actions.Description: The [name] hurls an explosive charge at a medium blast area effect in range. All characters inside take 4 damage and are shoved 3 away from the center.

Actions.Name: Flame Hurler
Actions.Description: The [name] sprays flame in a line 3 area effect in range. Characters in the area take 2 damage, and one character of the [name]'s choice is marked. While marked, they are pacified+, and cannot dash, rush, teleport, or fly. The mark ends if they end their turn adjacent to an ally.
